string.name: a11y_collapse_filters_sheet
string.translation_description: Description of a button to lower the filters sheet.

string.name: a11y_clear_tag_filters
string.translation_description: Description of a button to remove all current tag filters.

string.name: a11y_filter_applied
string.translation_description: Alternative text when an event filter is applies

string.name: a11y_filter_not_applied
string.translation_description: Alternative text when an event filter is not applies
